thread.title: Keith Curtis
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Keith Curtis

author: Keith Curtis
title: Keith Curtis
text: Everyone was so kind and curtious and most of all friendly. We went in 1 time and they knew us as soon as we went back in. We were not just a number they trested us like we were someone. They were not pushy at all. They helped us find what we were looking for and went out of their way to get it for us. I will go back again and again.
